SELECT a.*, b.table_name, concat(ifnull(GROUP_CONCAT(distinct d.name),'') ,if(GROUP_CONCAT(distinct d.name) is null or GROUP_CONCAT(distinct c.employee_name) is null,'',','), ifnull(GROUP_CONCAT(c.employee_name), '')) AS appraisalRange FROM `wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal` a LEFT JOIN `wk_hrm_achievement_table` b ON a.table_id = b.table_id left join wk_hrm_employee c on find_in_set(c.employee_id,a.employee_ids) left join wk_hrm_dept d on find_in_set(d.dept_id,a.dept_ids) where 1 = 1
and a.status = #{data.status}
and a.status in(1,2,3)
GROUP BY a.appraisal_id order by a.create_time desc

select ifnull((select count(*) from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal g left join wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal h on g.appraisal_id = h.appraisal_id where g.employee_id = a.employee_id and h.status = 4),0) as apprailsaledCnt, ifnull((select count(*) from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal g left join wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal h on g.appraisal_id = h.appraisal_id where g.employee_id = a.employee_id and h.status != 4),0) as apprailsalingCnt, b.appraisal_name as lastAppraisalName, if(a.level_id = null,null,concat(c.level_name,'(',a.score,')')) as lastAppraisalResult, d.employee_name,d.sex,d.status as employeeStatus,d.post,e.name as deptName from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal a left join wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal b on a.appraisal_id = b.appraisal_id left join wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal_score_level c on a.level_id = c.level_id left join wk_hrm_employee d on a.employee_id = d.employee_id left join wk_hrm_dept e on d.dept_id=e.dept_id where a.employee_id = #{employeeId} order by a.create_time desc limit 1

select a.employee_appraisal_id, a.employee_id, a.score, a.status, b.appraisal_name, b.start_time, b.end_time, c.level_name as resultLevel from `wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal` a left join `wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal` b on a.appraisal_id = b.appraisal_id left join `wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal_score_level` c on a.level_id = c.level_id where a.employee_id = #{employeeId} order by a.create_time desc
